What is the problem?
1. 4/4 Dragon Token (created by Broodmate Dragon), Flameblast Dragon and Balefire Dragon cannot block flying creatures
2. Skithiryx cannot attack (no matter if haste ability is paid or not) What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.20
author: [Suislide...@googlemail.com](https://code.google.com/u/109823435823693191845/)
title: Different Dragons cannot attack/block

comments.body:
Thanks for the report! 1.20 has a critical bug with the handling of abilities. After fixing the bug, the above problems no longer occur. Look out for 1.20b in a couple of hours.

**Status:** Fixed
